page.title: 11SATURDAY LIFE
page.content: My dad gets up at 9.30, has a cup of tea and gets dressed. He watches television and has another cup of tea with some toast and reads the newspaper. At about twelve o'clock he goes to work. He is a{taxi driver.}He does not come back till seven o'clock and thats when we have our tea. He usually watches T.V. for awhile and then goes back to work again. I don't see him again till the morning because he gets home again at one or two o'clock in the morning. My sister doesn't get up till ten o'clock. She is lazy. When she gets up she comes down stairs and has some breakfast. Normally she has a cup of tea and toast or cereal. She gets dressed at about eleven o'clock and sometimes goes to town or perhaps babysits for the lady along the road.
